ModMetaData.name: PowerSwitch
ModMetaData.author: Haplo
ModMetaData.description:
This adds a power switch to open/close your power lines. There are various research topics available, which adds to the functionality of the switch. You can research an upgrade with a motion detector, enemy detector or a timer. If you spend even more hours into your research, even an enemy detector for automatic switching may be available.
Description: - Pawn Detection in Room: Available after research with the normal switch. Detects, if an Pawn (human, animal) is in the room - Pawn Detection within 7 squares: Available after research. Normal pawn detection mode for wall switches. Normal switches can be switched between this mode and the pawn in room mode by repeatedly pressing the selection button. - Enemy detection (within 1/3 of the map): Available after research. Available modes: Switch on when detected and switch off when detected. - Timer: Available after research: Switches on and off at specified times. Time is initially set to 19h->On and 5h->Off. This can be changed by pressing the buttons repeatedly
- Research hidden power conduits.
(Version: 1.12.0)
